title: T200 Fatima Cleveland - Joe Jackson PSA1 $250 shipped
author: gnaz01

posts.post_title: T200 Fatima Cleveland - Joe Jackson PSA1 $250 shipped
posts.post_content: Hey folks, here is a PSA1 (looks much nicer) T200 Fatima Cigarettes Cleveland - w/ Shoeless Joe Jackson and Nap Lajoie.  Card looks great, it is probably graded a PSA1 because of a small pinhole at top center.  Anyway, a very affordable Shoeless Joe card.  Priced at $250 shipped.
